title: An Act authorizing the town of Topsfield to convert 4 licenses for sale of wine and malt beverages not to be drunk on the premises to 4 licenses for the sale of all alcoholic beverages not to be drunk on the premises and to prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages in the containers less than 200 milliliters

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Tarr, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2526) of Bruce E. Tarr, Kristin E. Kassner and Sally P. Kerans (by vote of the town) for legislation to authorize the town of Topsfield to convert 4 licenses for sale of wine and malt beverages not to be drunk on the premises to 4 licenses for the sale of all alcoholic beverages not to be drunk on the premises and to prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages in the containers less than 200 milliliters.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

related_entities.name: committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/14/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 10/14/2025 from 10:00 AM-11:30 AM in A-2                                                                                                                                                            and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
